segments.text: Where are you going to spend your holidays this year , Harry ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We may go abroad . I ’ m not sure . My wife wants to go to Egypt . I ’ d like to go there , too . We can ’ t make up our minds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you travel by sea or by air ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s cheaper , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It may be cheaper , but it takes a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure you will enjoy yourselves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t be so sure . We may not go anywhere . My wife always worries too much . Who ’ s going to look after the dog ? Who ’ s going to look after the house ? Who ’ s going to look after the garden ? We have t
segments.speaker: S2
